title: Intelligent Medical Prescription Reader
subtitle: POC for intelligent reading of medical prescriptions with OCR and NLP
description: POC web app using Next.js, Tesseract.js (OCR), and Compromise (NLP) to read, interpret, and standardize information extracted from medical prescriptions in image format. Automates the reading and understanding of prescriptions using AI, making the process faster, safer, and less prone to human error.
overview: Automates the reading and understanding of medical prescriptions using artificial intelligence. Uses advanced NLP techniques to interpret extracted texts, even with writing variations, OCR errors, or different prescription formats.
howItWorks: Text normalization and processing with Compromise (NLP), identifying drug name, dosage, and quantity.
Standardization of drug names and return of structured data.
Uses a local and simplified database for simulation only.
nlpHighlights: The project's differential is the use of NLP to interpret the extracted text, going beyond simple reading. Compromise allows the identification of patterns, drug names, and quantities, even with common OCR or handwriting errors.
limitations: Project created for technical demonstration (POC) only.
Local and limited database, does not cover all drugs.
Not recommended for real or production use.
